title: hey. why are they?

replies.body:
jake... I don't get your speech... but I "somewhat" understand this post...
if you see everyone as steve, that means your bandwith isn't good enough, and/or server-side problems. for avicus... its probably both, since most of the time I see steves, but once in awhile, people have their skins

replies.body: Please stop these random threads that make no sense.

replies.body: Random threads like these often get locked by moderators, and it is overall annoying for forum users.
